message.name: MitchTime
message.description: Sent by the server for every second for which at least one application message is generated. This message is not transmitted during periods where no other application messages are generated

field.name: seconds
field.description: Number of seconds since midnight. Midnight will be in terms of the local time for the server (i.e. not UTC)

message.name: MitchSystemEvent
message.description: Sent to indicate the start and end of the day

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: eventCode
field.description: C = End of Day, O = Start of Day

message.name: MitchAddOrder
message.description: Sent when a new visible order is added to the order book

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Unique identifier of the order

field.name: side
field.description: B = Buy, S = Sell

field.name: quantity
field.description: Displayed quantity of the order

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: price
field.description: Limit price of the order. If Market, it will be filled with spaces

field.name: flags
field.description: Bit 4: Market Order (0 = No, 1 = Yes), Bit 5: Bulletin Board (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

message.name: MitchAddAttributedOrder
message.description: Sent when a new visible order with firm attribution is added to the order book

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Unique identifier of the order

field.name: side
field.description: B = Buy, S = Sell

field.name: quantity
field.description: Displayed quantity of the order

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: price
field.description: Limit price of the order. If Market, it will be filled with spaces

field.name: firm
field.description: Identity of firm that submitted the order

field.name: flags
field.description: Bit 4: Market Order (0 = No, 1 = Yes), Bit 5: Bulletin Board (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

message.name: MitchOrderDeleted
message.description: Sent when a visible order is deleted from the order book

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Unique identifier of the order

field.name: oldQuantity
field.description: Displayed quantity of the order

field.name: oldPrice
field.description: Limit price of the order

message.name: MitchOrderModified
message.description: Sent when a visible order is modified in the order book

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Unique identifier of the order

field.name: newQuantity
field.description: New displayed quantity of the order

field.name: newPrice
field.description: New limit price of the order

field.name: oldQuantity
field.description: Displayed quantity of the order

field.name: oldPrice
field.description: Limit price of the order

field.name: flags
field.description: Bit 0: Priority Flag (0 = Priority Lost, 1 = Priority Retained)

message.name: MitchOrderBookClear
message.description: Sent to indicate that the order book for an instrument should be cleared

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: subBook
field.description: 1 = Regular, 2 = Off-Book, 9 = Bulletin Board, 11 = Negotiated Trades

field.name: bookType
field.description: 0 = MBP/MBO/Statistics, 1 = Top of Book

message.name: MitchOrderExecuted
message.description: Sent when an order is executed in whole or in part

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Identifier for the order

field.name: executedQuantity
field.description: Quantity executed

field.name: price
field.description: The price at which the trade was executed

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: tradeId
field.description: Unique identifier of the trade

field.name: lastOptPx
field.description: Converted price of the executed volatility of the options instrument

field.name: volatility
field.description: Converted volatility of the executed price of the options instrument

field.name: underlyingReferencePrice
field.description: Underlying Reference Price related to converted value calculated upon an options instrument trade execution

field.name: tradingDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was executed [Epoch]

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCode
field.description: Instrument identification code

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCodeType
field.description: 1 = ISIN Code

field.name: currency
field.description: Currency in which the price of the trade is expressed

field.name: venueOfExecution
field.description: Identification of the venue where the trade was executed

field.name: priceNotation
field.description: 1 = MONE - Monetary value, 2 = PERC - Percentage, 3 = YIEL - Yield

field.name: notionalAmount
field.description: Notional value relevant to the security

field.name: notionalCurrency
field.description: The currency in which the notional is represented

field.name: publicationDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was published by the trading venue [Epoch]

field.name: firm
field.description: Firm ID of the party firm

field.name: contraFirm
field.description: Firm ID of the counter party firm

message.name: MitchOrderExecutedWithPriceSize
message.description: Sent when an order is executed and includes remaining display quantity

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Identifier for the order

field.name: executedQuantity
field.description: Quantity executed

field.name: price
field.description: The price at which the trade was executed

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: tradeId
field.description: Unique identifier of the trade

field.name: lastOptPx
field.description: Converted price of the executed volatility of the options instrument

field.name: volatility
field.description: Converted volatility of the executed price of the options instrument

field.name: underlyingReferencePrice
field.description: Underlying Reference Price related to converted value calculated upon an options instrument trade execution

field.name: tradingDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was executed [Epoch]

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCode
field.description: Instrument identification code

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCodeType
field.description: 1 = ISIN Code

field.name: currency
field.description: Currency in which the price of the trade is expressed

field.name: venueOfExecution
field.description: Identification of the venue where the trade was executed

field.name: priceNotation
field.description: 1 = MONE - Monetary value, 2 = PERC - Percentage, 3 = YIEL - Yield

field.name: notionalAmount
field.description: Notional value relevant to the security

field.name: notionalCurrency
field.description: The currency in which the notional is represented

field.name: publicationDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was published by the trading venue [Epoch]

field.name: firm
field.description: Firm ID of the party firm

field.name: contraFirm
field.description: Firm ID of the counter party firm

field.name: displayQuantity
field.description: Displayed quantity of the order after the execution

field.name: printable
field.description: N = Non-Printable, Y = Printable

message.name: MitchAuctionInfo
message.description: Sent to provide indicative auction information during auction periods

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: pairedQuantity
field.description: Quantity that will be matched at the indicative price

field.name: imbalanceQuantity
field.description: Quantity that is eligible to be matched at the indicative price but will not be matched

field.name: imbalanceDirection
field.description: B = Buy Imbalance, N = No Imbalance, O = Insufficient Orders for Auction, S = Sell Imbalance

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: price
field.description: Indicative auction price

field.name: auctionType
field.description: A = Re-Opening Auction, C = Closing Auction, O = Opening Auction

message.name: MitchAuctionTrade
message.description: Sent when a trade occurs during an auction

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: executedQuantity
field.description: Quantity executed

field.name: price
field.description: Executed price

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: tradeId
field.description: Unique identifier of the trade

field.name: lastOptPx
field.description: Converted price of the executed volatility of the options instrument

field.name: volatility
field.description: Converted volatility of the executed price of the options instrument

field.name: underlyingReferencePrice
field.description: Underlying Reference Price related to converted value calculated upon an options instrument trade execution

field.name: tradingDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was executed [Epoch]

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCode
field.description: Instrument identification code

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCodeType
field.description: 1 = ISIN Code

field.name: currency
field.description: Currency in which the price of the trade is expressed

field.name: venueOfExecution
field.description: Identification of the venue where the trade was executed

field.name: priceNotation
field.description: 1 = MONE - Monetary value, 2 = PERC - Percentage, 3 = YIEL - Yield

field.name: notionalAmount
field.description: Notional value relevant to the security

field.name: notionalCurrency
field.description: The currency in which the notional is represented

field.name: publicationDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was published by the trading venue [Epoch]

field.name: cancellationFlag
field.description: Indicates if the trade has been cancelled (Value = CANC)

field.name: amendmentFlag
field.description: Indicates if the trade has been amended (Value = AMND)

field.name: auctionType
field.description: A = Re-Opening Auction, C = Closing Auction, O = Opening Auction

message.name: MitchRecoveryTrade
message.description: Sent during recovery to provide historical trade information

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Identifier for the order

field.name: executedQuantity
field.description: Quantity executed

field.name: price
field.description: Executed price

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: tradeId
field.description: Unique identifier of the trade

field.name: lastOptPx
field.description: Converted price of the executed volatility of the options instrument

field.name: volatility
field.description: Converted volatility of the executed price of the options instrument

field.name: underlyingReferencePrice
field.description: Underlying Reference Price related to converted value calculated upon an options instrument trade execution

field.name: tradingDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was executed [Epoch]

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCode
field.description: Instrument identification code

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCodeType
field.description: 1 = ISIN Code

field.name: currency
field.description: Currency in which the price of the trade is expressed

field.name: venueOfExecution
field.description: Identification of the venue where the trade was executed

field.name: priceNotation
field.description: 1 = MONE - Monetary value, 2 = PERC - Percentage, 3 = YIEL - Yield

field.name: notionalAmount
field.description: Notional value relevant to the security

field.name: notionalCurrency
field.description: The currency in which the notional is represented

field.name: publicationDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was published by the trading venue [Epoch]

field.name: firm
field.description: Firm ID of the party firm

field.name: contraFirm
field.description: Firm ID of the counter party firm

field.name: cancellationFlag
field.description: Indicates if the trade has been cancelled (Value = CANC)

field.name: amendmentFlag
field.description: Indicates if the trade has been amended (Value = AMND)

field.name: subBook
field.description: 1 = Regular, 11 = Negotiated Trades

field.name: flags
field.description: Bit 0: Trade Condition Flag, Bit 1: Internal Crossed Trade, Bit 5: RLP

field.name: auctionType
field.description: A = Re-Opening Auction, C = Closing Auction, O = Opening Auction

message.name: MitchStatistics
message.description: Sent to provide statistical information about instruments

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: statisticType
field.description: C = Closing Price, O = Opening Price, P = Previous Close

field.name: price
field.description: Opening or closing price

field.name: openCloseIndicator
field.description: A = Auction Trade, B = Regular Trade, C = Mid Point, D = Last Regular Trade, E = Last Auction, F = Manual, H = VWAP, I = Previous Close, T = Theoretical Price, L = VWAP n Volume, U = Best Bid, V = Best Offer, W = None, X = VWAP of Last n Trades, Y = Reference Price, Z = Price Unavailable

field.name: subBook
field.description: 1 = Regular, 2 = Off-Book, 9 = Bulletin Board

message.name: MitchExtendedStatistics
message.description: Sent to provide extended statistical information about instruments

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: highPrice
field.description: High Price of the instrument. Will be set to a negative value if not set or withdrawn

field.name: lowPrice
field.description: Low Price of the instrument. Will be set to a negative value if not set or withdrawn

field.name: vwap
field.description: VWAP of the instrument. Will be set to a negative value if not set or withdrawn

field.name: volume
field.description: Volume of the instrument. Will be set to zero if not set or withdrawn

field.name: turnover
field.description: Turnover of the instrument. Will be set to a negative value if not set or withdrawn

field.name: numberOfTrades
field.description: Number of trades for this instrument. Will be set to zero if not set or withdrawn

field.name: reservedField
field.description: Reserved for future use

field.name: subBook
field.description: 1 = Regular, 2 = Off-Book, 11 = Negotiated Trades

field.name: notionalExposure
field.description: Notional exposure related to the options trade executions

field.name: notionalDeltaExposure
field.description: Notional exposure updated by the delta of the option based on trade executions

field.name: theoreticalPrice
field.description: Theoretical Price of the options trade

field.name: volatility
field.description: Converted volatility of the executed price of the options instrument

field.name: upperDynamicPBLimit
field.description: Upper Dynamic Price Band Limit of the instrument

field.name: lowerDynamicPBLimit
field.description: Lower Dynamic Price Band Limit of the instrument

field.name: upperStaticPBLimit
field.description: Upper Static Price Band Limit of the instrument

field.name: lowerStaticPBLimit
field.description: Lower Static Price Band Limit of the instrument

field.name: upperDynamicCBLimit
field.description: Upper Dynamic Circuit Breaker Limit of the instrument

field.name: lowerDynamicCBLimit
field.description: Lower Dynamic Circuit Breaker Limit of the instrument

message.name: MitchSymbolStatus
message.description: Sent to indicate changes in trading status

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: tradingStatus
field.description: H = Halt, T = Regular Trading, a = Opening Auction Call, b = Post-Close, c = Market Close, d = Closing Auction Call, e = Re-Opening Auction Call, l = Pause, w = No Active Session, x = End of Post Close, y = Pre-Trading

field.name: flags
field.description: Reserved for future use

field.name: haltReason
field.description: Reason for the trading halt. This field will contain only spaces if Trading Status is not 'H'

field.name: sessionChangeReason
field.description: 0 = Scheduled Transition, 1 = Extended by Market Ops, 2 = Shortened by Market Ops, 3 = Market Order Extension, 4 = Price Monitoring Extension, 5 = Circuit Breaker Tripped, 9 = Unavailable, 10 = No Cancel Period Start

field.name: newEndTime
field.description: New session end time (EPOCH). The field will contain only spaces if Session Change Reason is '0' or '9'

field.name: subBook
field.description: 1 = Regular, 2 = Off-Book, 9 = Bulletin Board, 11 = Negotiated Trades

message.name: MitchTopOfBook
message.description: Sent to provide top of book information

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: subBook
field.description: Bit 0: Regular (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 5: Bulletin Board (0=No, 1=Yes)

field.name: action
field.description: 1 = Update, 2 = Delete

field.name: side
field.description: B = Buy, S = Sell

field.name: price
field.description: Best price for the particular side

field.name: quantity
field.description: Cumulative visible size at best price

field.name: marketOrderQuantity
field.description: Cumulative visible size of market orders

field.name: reservedField
field.description: Reserved for future use

field.name: splits
field.description: Cumulative visible orders at Best price. This will be set to zero on a delete action

message.name: MitchTrade
message.description: Sent when a non-displayed trade occurs

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: orderId
field.description: Identifier for the order

field.name: executedQuantity
field.description: Quantity executed

field.name: price
field.description: Executed price

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric identifier of the instrument

field.name: tradeId
field.description: Unique identifier of the trade

field.name: lastOptPx
field.description: Converted price of the executed volatility of the options instrument

field.name: volatility
field.description: Converted volatility of the executed price of the options instrument

field.name: underlyingReferencePrice
field.description: Underlying Reference Price related to converted value calculated upon an options instrument trade execution

field.name: tradingDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was executed [Epoch]

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCode
field.description: Instrument identification code

field.name: instrumentIdentificationCodeType
field.description: 1 = ISIN Code

field.name: currency
field.description: Currency in which the price of the trade is expressed

field.name: venueOfExecution
field.description: Identification of the venue where the trade was executed

field.name: priceNotation
field.description: 1 = MONE - Monetary value, 2 = PERC - Percentage, 3 = YIEL - Yield

field.name: notionalAmount
field.description: Notional value relevant to the security

field.name: notionalCurrency
field.description: The currency in which the notional is represented

field.name: publicationDateTime
field.description: Date and time when the trade was published by the trading venue [Epoch]

field.name: firm
field.description: Firm ID of the party firm

field.name: contraFirm
field.description: Firm ID of the counter party firm

field.name: cancellationFlag
field.description: Indicates if the trade has been cancelled (Value = CANC)

field.name: amendmentFlag
field.description: Indicates if the trade has been amended (Value = AMND)

field.name: subBook
field.description: 1 = Regular, 11 = Negotiated Trades

field.name: flags
field.description: Bit 0: Trade Condition Flag, Bit 1: Internal Crossed Trade, Bit 5: RLP

message.name: MitchNews
message.description: Sent to disseminate news and announcements

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: time
field.description: Time the announcement was published (EPOCH)

field.name: urgency
field.description: 0 = Regular, 1 = High Priority, 2 = Low Priority

field.name: headline
field.description: Headline or subject of announcement

field.name: text
field.description: Text of the announcement

field.name: instrumentIds
field.description: Pipe separated list of Instrument IDs

field.name: underlyingInstrumentIds
field.description: Pipe separated list of Underlying Instrument IDs

message.name: MitchLoginRequest
message.description: Sent by client to authenticate with the server

field.name: username
field.description: CompID assigned to the client

field.name: password
field.description: Password assigned to the CompID

field.name: ipAddress
field.description: Original IP Address the user is running from (the server IP Address for audit purpose)

field.name: certifiedSolution
field.description: Identifier of the solution that has been certificated against A5X trading platform (ex.: Trading System v1.0)

message.name: MitchLoginResponse
message.description: Sent by server in response to login request

field.name: status
field.description: A = Login Accepted, a = CompID Inactive/Locked, b = Login Limit Reached, c = Service Unavailable, d = Concurrent Limit Reached, e = Failed (Other)

message.name: MitchLogoutRequest
message.description: Sent by client to logout

message.name: MitchSymbolDirectory
message.description: Used to disseminate information on each instrument

field.name: nanosecond
field.description: Nanoseconds offset from the last Time message

field.name: symbol
field.description: Instrument's symbol

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the instrument

field.name: symbolStatus
field.description: Space = Active, H = Halted, S = Suspended, a = Inactive

field.name: identificationNumber
field.description: Instrument identification number (e.g. ISIN, CUSIP, etc.)

field.name: segment
field.description: Segment the instrument is assigned to

field.name: expirationDate
field.description: Date an instrument expires or matures. This field will contain only spaces if the instrument is not a derivative or fixed income instrument

field.name: underlying
field.description: Symbol of the underlying instrument. This field will contain only spaces if the instrument is not a derivative

field.name: underlyingInstrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the underlying instrument

field.name: strikePrice
field.description: Strike price of an option. The price will be zero if the instrument is not an option

field.name: optionType
field.description: Space = Not option, C = Call Option, P = Put Option

field.name: issuer
field.description: Issuer of the instrument. This field will contain all spaces if the instrument is not a fixed income instrument

field.name: issueDate
field.description: Date instrument was issued. This field will contain all spaces if the instrument is not a fixed income instrument

field.name: coupon
field.description: Rate of interest applied to the face value. This is a percentage field (e.g. 0.05 represents 5%)

field.name: flags
field.description: Bit 0: Inverse Order Book (0 = No, 1 = Yes)

field.name: subBook
field.description: Bit 0: Regular (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 1: Off-Book (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 5: Bulletin Board (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 6: Negotiated Trades (0=No, 1=Yes)

field.name: corporateAction
field.description: Pipe separated field. Identifies the type of Corporate Actions applicable on the instrument for the current Trading day

field.name: partitionId
field.description: Identity of the partition

field.name: exerciseStyle
field.description: Space = Not option, A = American, E = European

field.name: leg1Symbol
field.description: Symbol of Leg 1 instrument. This field will contain only spaces if the instrument is not a multi-legged instrument

field.name: leg1InstrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the leg 1 instrument

field.name: leg2Symbol
field.description: Symbol of Leg 2 instrument. This field will contain only spaces if the instrument is not a multi-legged instrument

field.name: leg2InstrumentId
field.description: Numeric Identifier of the leg 2 instrument

field.name: contractMultiplier
field.description: Defines the multiplier of the instrument. This field will contain 0 value if the instrument does not have a contract multiplier

field.name: settlementMethod
field.description: Space = No method, C = Cash, P = Physical

field.name: testInstrument
field.description: 0 = Not test, 1 = Exchange only, 2 = End to end test

field.name: venueOfExecution
field.description: Trading venue where the symbol was originated

field.name: lotSize
field.description: Lot Size of the Instrument

field.name: securityDescription
field.description: Description of the instrument

field.name: listMethod
field.description: P = Pre-Listed, U = User Defined

field.name: currency
field.description: Trading currency of the instrument

field.name: tickSize
field.description: Instrument Tick Size (e.g. 0.01, 0.50, 0.001)

field.name: minimumCrossOrderSize
field.description: Minimum size that cross orders should have

field.name: minimumSizeQty
field.description: Minimum allowed quantity of an order

field.name: maximumSizeQty
field.description: Maximum allowed quantity of an order

field.name: securityType
field.description: 0=CORP, 1=CST, 2=FUT, 3=MLEG, 4=OOF, 5=OPT, 6=PS, 7=TB, 8=TBILL, 9=TBOND, 10=TIPS

field.name: assetName
field.description: Asset Name (e.g. PETR)

message.name: MitchReplayRequest
message.description: Sent by client to request retransmission of messages

field.name: marketDataGroup
field.description: Identity of the market data group the replay request relates to

field.name: firstMessage
field.description: Sequence number of the first message in range to be retransmitted

field.name: count
field.description: Number of messages to be resent

message.name: MitchReplayResponse
message.description: Sent by server in response to replay request

field.name: marketDataGroup
field.description: Identity of the market data group the replay request relates to

field.name: firstMessage
field.description: Sequence number of the first message in range to be retransmitted. This will be zero if Status is not 'A'

field.name: count
field.description: Number of messages to be resent. This will be zero if Status is not 'A'

field.name: status
field.description: A = Request Accepted, D = Request Limit Reached, I = Invalid Market Data Group, O = Out of Range, U = Replay Unavailable, c = Concurrent Limit Reached, d = Unsupported Message Type, e = Failed (Other)

message.name: MitchSnapshotRequest
message.description: Sent by client to request snapshot data

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Sequence number from which client can build the order book

field.name: segment
field.description: Segment the request relates to. The field should contain only spaces if it does not relate to a segment

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Instrument ID of the instrument that the request relates to. The field should contain only spaces if it does not relate to an instrument. This field is ignored if Segment is specified

field.name: subBook
field.description: Bit 0: Regular (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 1: Off-Book (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 5: Bulletin Board (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 6: Negotiated Trades (0=No, 1=Yes)

field.name: snapshotType
field.description: 0=Order Book, 1=Symbol Status, 2=Instrument, 3=Trades, 4=Statistics, 5=News, 8=Top of Book

field.name: recoverFromTime
field.description: Sending time of the last processed trade (EPOCH time in seconds). This field is ignored if the Snapshot Type is not Trades (3) or News (5)

field.name: requestId
field.description: Optional identifier of the request

message.name: MitchSnapshotResponse
message.description: Sent by server in response to snapshot request

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Sequence number with which the snapshot is synchronized. This will be zero if Status is not 'A'. Ignore if Snapshot Type is not Order Book (0)

field.name: orderCount
field.description: Number of orders that will be transmitted in the snapshot. This will be zero if Order Book is empty or Status is not 'A'. However, if the Snapshot Request was submitted for multiple order books, this field will be set to zero. Ignore if Snapshot Type is not Order Book (0)

field.name: status
field.description: A = Request Accepted, O = Out of Range, U = Snapshot Unavailable, a = Segment/Symbol/Sub Book Invalid or Not Specified, b = Request Limit Reached, c = Concurrent Limit Reached, d = Unsupported Message Type, e = Failed (Other)

field.name: snapshotType
field.description: 0=Order Book, 1=Symbol Status, 2=Instrument, 3=Trades, 4=Statistics, 5=News, 8=Top of Book

field.name: requestId
field.description: Identifier, if any, of Snapshot Request

message.name: MitchSnapshotComplete
message.description: Sent by server to indicate snapshot transmission is complete

field.name: sequenceNumber
field.description: Sequence number with which the snapshot is synchronized

field.name: segment
field.description: Segment the snapshot relates to. The field will contain only spaces if it does not relate to a segment

field.name: instrumentId
field.description: Instrument ID of the instrument that the snapshot relates to. The field will contain only spaces if it does not relate to an instrument

field.name: subBook
field.description: Bit 0: Regular (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 1: Off-Book (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 5: Bulletin Board (0=No, 1=Yes), Bit 6: Negotiated Trades (0=No, 1=Yes)

field.name: tradingStatus
field.description: H=Halt, T=Regular Trading, a=Opening Auction Call, b=Post-Close, c=Market Closed, d=Closing Auction Call, e=Re-Opening Auction Call, I=Pause, n=Order Entry, u=Closing Price Cross, w=No Active Session, y=Pre-Trading, m=No Cancel Period. Only indicated if message is sent as book level complete and Snapshot Type is Order Book (0) or Statistics (4)

field.name: snapshotType
field.description: 0=Order Book, 1=Symbol Status, 2=Instrument, 3=Trades, 4=Statistics, 5=News, 8=Top of Book

field.name: requestId
field.description: Identifier, if any, of Snapshot Request
